title: New: Mr. Muthafuckin eXquire – RIP Payso
body: Not that we needed a reason to return back to [**ASAP Rocky**’s](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11834-new-mpfree-asap-rocky-out-of-this-world/ "New & MPfree: ASAP Rocky – Out Of This World") rather fucking brilliant ‘Peso’, **Mr. Muthafuckin’ eXquire** has given us another. The track only comes in at around 1.30 minutes, but with a flow this great not much more is needed. It’s the perfect antidote to the original; brutal, honest and rocking that NY sound that’s becoming a signature of our times.
